imagePullSecrets.description: Global Docker registry secret names as an array

kubeVersion.description: Force target Kubernetes version (using Helm capabilities if not set)

nameOverride.description: String to partially override common.names.fullname template (will maintain the release name)

fullnameOverride.description: String to fully override common.names.fullname template

commonAnnotations.description: Common annotations to add to all MySQL resources (sub-charts are not considered). Evaluated as a template

commonLabels.description: Common labels to add to all MySQL resources (sub-charts are not considered). Evaluated as a template

extraDeploy.description: Array with extra yaml to deploy with the chart. Evaluated as a template

enabled.description: Enable diagnostic mode (all probes will be disabled and the command will be overridden)

command.description: Command to override all containers in the deployment

args.description: Args to override all containers in the deployment

digest.description: MySQL image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

pullSecrets.description: Specify docker-registry secret names as an array

debug.description: Specify if debug logs should be enabled

rootPassword.description: Password for the `root` user. Ignored if existing secret is provided

createDatabase.description: Whether to create the .Values.auth.database or not

database.description: Name for a custom database to create

username.description: Name for a custom user to create

password.description: Password for the new user. Ignored if existing secret is provided

replicationPassword.description: MySQL replication user password. Ignored if existing secret is provided

existingSecret.description: Use existing secret for password details. The secret has to contain the keys `mysql-root-password`, `mysql-replication-password` and `mysql-password`

usePasswordFiles.description: Mount credentials as files instead of using an environment variable

customPasswordFiles.description: Use custom password files when `auth.usePasswordFiles` is set to `true`. Define path for keys `root` and `user`, also define `replicator` if `architecture` is set to `replication`

initdbScriptsConfigMap.description: ConfigMap with the initdb scripts (Note: Overrides `initdbScripts`)

startdbScriptsConfigMap.description: ConfigMap with the startdb scripts (Note: Overrides `startdbScripts`)

name.description: Name of the primary database (eg primary, master, leader, ...)

command.description: Override default container command on MySQL Primary container(s) (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args on MySQL Primary container(s) (useful when using custom images)

lifecycleHooks.description: for the MySQL Primary container(s) to automate configuration before or after startup

configuration.description: Configure MySQL Primary with a custom my.cnf file

existingConfigmap.description: Name of existing ConfigMap with MySQL Primary configuration.

type.description: Update strategy type for the MySQL primary statefulset

podAnnotations.description: Additional pod annotations for MySQL primary pods

podAffinityPreset.description: MySQL primary pod affinity preset. Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: MySQL primary pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

type.description: MySQL primary node affinity preset type. Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: MySQL primary node label key to match Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set.

values.description: MySQL primary node label values to match. Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set.

affinity.description: Affinity for MySQL primary pods assignment

nodeSelector.description: Node labels for MySQL primary pods assignment

tolerations.description: Tolerations for MySQL primary pods assignment

schedulerName.description: Name of the k8s scheduler (other than default)

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: In seconds, time the given to the MySQL primary pod needs to terminate gracefully

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology Spread Constraints for pod assignment

podManagementPolicy.description: podManagementPolicy to manage scaling operation of MySQL primary pods

enabled.description: Enable security context for MySQL primary pods

fsGroup.description: Group ID for the mounted volumes' filesystem

runAsUser.description: User ID for the MySQL primary container

runAsNonRoot.description: Set MySQL primary container's Security Context runAsNonRoot

type.description: Set Client container's Security Context seccomp profile

limits.description: The resources limits for MySQL primary containers

requests.description: The requested resources for MySQL primary containers

customLivenessProbe.description: Override default liveness probe for MySQL primary containers

customReadinessProbe.description: Override default readiness probe for MySQL primary containers

customStartupProbe.description: Override default startup probe for MySQL primary containers

extraFlags.description: MySQL primary additional command line flags

extraEnvVars.description: Extra environment variables to be set on MySQL primary containers

extraEnvVarsCM.description: Name of existing ConfigMap containing extra env vars for MySQL primary containers

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Name of existing Secret containing extra env vars for MySQL primary containers

enabled.description: Enable persistence on MySQL primary replicas using a `PersistentVolumeClaim`. If false, use emptyDir

existingClaim.description: Name of an existing `PersistentVolumeClaim` for MySQL primary replicas

subPath.description: The name of a volume's sub path to mount for persistence

storageClass.description: MySQL primary persistent volume storage Class

annotations.description: MySQL primary persistent volume claim annotations

accessModes.description: MySQL primary persistent volume access Modes

selector.description: Selector to match an existing Persistent Volume

extraVolumes.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumes to the MySQL Primary pod(s)

extraVolumeMounts.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumeMounts for the MySQL Primary container(s)

initContainers.description: Add additional init containers for the MySQL Primary pod(s)

sidecars.description: Add additional sidecar containers for the MySQL Primary pod(s)

mysql.description: MySQL Primary K8s service node port

clusterIP.description: MySQL Primary K8s service clusterIP IP

loadBalancerIP.description: MySQL Primary loadBalancerIP if service type is `LoadBalancer`

loadBalancerSourceRanges.description: Addresses that are allowed when MySQL Primary service is LoadBalancer

extraPorts.description: Extra ports to expose (normally used with the `sidecar` value)

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for MySQL primary service

sessionAffinity.description: Session Affinity for Kubernetes service, can be "None" or "ClientIP"

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for headless MySQL primary service.

create.description: Enable/disable a Pod Disruption Budget creation for MySQL primary pods

minAvailable.description: Minimum number/percentage of MySQL primary pods that should remain scheduled

maxUnavailable.description: Maximum number/percentage of MySQL primary pods that may be made unavailable

podLabels.description: MySQL Primary pod label. If labels are same as commonLabels , this will take precedence

name.description: Name of the secondary database (eg secondary, slave, ...)

command.description: Override default container command on MySQL Secondary container(s) (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args on MySQL Secondary container(s) (useful when using custom images)

lifecycleHooks.description: for the MySQL Secondary container(s) to automate configuration before or after startup

configuration.description: Configure MySQL Secondary with a custom my.cnf file

existingConfigmap.description: Name of existing ConfigMap with MySQL Secondary configuration.

type.description: Update strategy type for the MySQL secondary statefulset

podAnnotations.description: Additional pod annotations for MySQL secondary pods

podAffinityPreset.description: MySQL secondary pod affinity preset. Ignored if `secondary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: MySQL secondary pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `secondary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

type.description: MySQL secondary node affinity preset type. Ignored if `secondary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: MySQL secondary node label key to match Ignored if `secondary.affinity` is set.

values.description: MySQL secondary node label values to match. Ignored if `secondary.affinity` is set.

affinity.description: Affinity for MySQL secondary pods assignment

nodeSelector.description: Node labels for MySQL secondary pods assignment

tolerations.description: Tolerations for MySQL secondary pods assignment

schedulerName.description: Name of the k8s scheduler (other than default)

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: In seconds, time the given to the MySQL secondary pod needs to terminate gracefully

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology Spread Constraints for pod assignment

podManagementPolicy.description: podManagementPolicy to manage scaling operation of MySQL secondary pods

enabled.description: Enable security context for MySQL secondary pods

fsGroup.description: Group ID for the mounted volumes' filesystem

runAsUser.description: User ID for the MySQL secondary container

runAsNonRoot.description: Set MySQL secondary container's Security Context runAsNonRoot

type.description: Set container's Security Context seccomp profile

limits.description: The resources limits for MySQL secondary containers

requests.description: The requested resources for MySQL secondary containers

customLivenessProbe.description: Override default liveness probe for MySQL secondary containers

customReadinessProbe.description: Override default readiness probe for MySQL secondary containers

customStartupProbe.description: Override default startup probe for MySQL secondary containers

extraFlags.description: MySQL secondary additional command line flags

extraEnvVars.description: An array to add extra environment variables on MySQL secondary containers

extraEnvVarsCM.description: Name of existing ConfigMap containing extra env vars for MySQL secondary containers

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Name of existing Secret containing extra env vars for MySQL secondary containers

enabled.description: Enable persistence on MySQL secondary replicas using a `PersistentVolumeClaim`

existingClaim.description: Name of an existing `PersistentVolumeClaim` for MySQL secondary replicas

subPath.description: The name of a volume's sub path to mount for persistence

storageClass.description: MySQL secondary persistent volume storage Class

annotations.description: MySQL secondary persistent volume claim annotations

accessModes.description: MySQL secondary persistent volume access Modes

selector.description: Selector to match an existing Persistent Volume

extraVolumes.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumes to the MySQL secondary pod(s)

extraVolumeMounts.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumeMounts for the MySQL secondary container(s)

initContainers.description: Add additional init containers for the MySQL secondary pod(s)

sidecars.description: Add additional sidecar containers for the MySQL secondary pod(s)

mysql.description: MySQL secondary Kubernetes service node port

clusterIP.description: MySQL secondary Kubernetes service clusterIP IP

loadBalancerIP.description: MySQL secondary loadBalancerIP if service type is `LoadBalancer`

loadBalancerSourceRanges.description: Addresses that are allowed when MySQL secondary service is LoadBalancer

extraPorts.description: Extra ports to expose (normally used with the `sidecar` value)

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for MySQL secondary service

sessionAffinity.description: Session Affinity for Kubernetes service, can be "None" or "ClientIP"

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for headless MySQL secondary service.

create.description: Enable/disable a Pod Disruption Budget creation for MySQL secondary pods

minAvailable.description: Minimum number/percentage of MySQL secondary pods that should remain scheduled

maxUnavailable.description: Maximum number/percentage of MySQL secondary pods that may be made unavailable

podLabels.description: Additional pod labels for MySQL secondary pods

create.description: Enable the creation of a ServiceAccount for MySQL pods

automountServiceAccountToken.description: Automount service account token for the server service account

create.description: Whether to create & use RBAC resources or not

explicitNamespacesSelector.description: A Kubernetes LabelSelector to explicitly select namespaces from which ingress traffic could be allowed to MySQL

enabled.description: Enable init container that changes the owner and group of the persistent volume(s) mountpoint to `runAsUser:fsGroup`

digest.description: Init container volume-permissions image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

pullPolicy.description: Init container volume-permissions image pull policy

pullSecrets.description: Specify docker-registry secret names as an array

digest.description: Exporter image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

pullSecrets.description: Specify docker-registry secret names as an array

runAsUser.description: User ID for the MySQL metrics container

runAsNonRoot.description: Set MySQL metrics container's Security Context runAsNonRoot

type.description: Kubernetes service type for MySQL Prometheus Exporter

clusterIP.description: Kubernetes service clusterIP for MySQL Prometheus Exporter

primary.description: Extra args to be passed to mysqld_exporter on Primary pods

secondary.description: Extra args to be passed to mysqld_exporter on Secondary pods

limits.description: The resources limits for MySQL prometheus exporter containers

requests.description: The requested resources for MySQL prometheus exporter containers

enabled.description: Create ServiceMonitor Resource for scraping metrics using PrometheusOperator

namespace.description: Specify the namespace in which the serviceMonitor resource will be created

jobLabel.description: The name of the label on the target service to use as the job name in prometheus.

interval.description: Specify the interval at which metrics should be scraped

scrapeTimeout.description: Specify the timeout after which the scrape is ended

relabelings.description: RelabelConfigs to apply to samples before scraping

metricRelabelings.description: MetricRelabelConfigs to apply to samples before ingestion

honorLabels.description: Specify honorLabels parameter to add the scrape endpoint

labels.description: Used to pass Labels that are used by the Prometheus installed in your cluster to select Service Monitors to work with

enabled.description: Creates a Prometheus Operator prometheusRule (also requires `metrics.enabled` to be `true` and `metrics.prometheusRule.rules`)

namespace.description: Namespace for the prometheusRule Resource (defaults to the Release Namespace)

additionalLabels.description: Additional labels that can be used so prometheusRule will be discovered by Prometheus
